name: PointsBuddy
0:
”Alexa, open points buddy”
”Alexa, start points buddy”
”Alexa, launch points buddy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: points buddy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Figure out the value of your points! Simply provide basic cost information about your hotel or flight and Points Buddy will calculate the cents-per-point redemption value for that itinerary. Alexa will then compare the results to the average valuation for that rewards program to convey if you're receiving good value for your points! Some award programs are available for all users. The premium version of points buddy, points buddy pro, gives users access to award redemption calculation for almost all hotel, airline, and bank (U.S. only) loyalty programs around the world!

Free Programs Supported:
American Airlines
American Express Membership Rewards
Delta Airlines
Marriott
United Airlines

List of Airlines/Programs Supported:

A.N.A Mileage Club
